Unless otherwise specified, hotel prices are per night, based on double-occupancy rooms and do not include taxes and fees. Unless specified to be one-way (ow) or otherwise, flight prices are for round-trip (rt) economy class travel and include taxes and fees. If in doubt, always consult the agent or company supplying the tickets. Unless otherwise specified, package prices include flight + hotel, taxes and fees, but not baggage fees or other fees charged directly by the airline for the included flight.
